hackathon-eligibility: Anyone 13 years of age or older may participate in the challenge.
hackathon-rules:
Submission Period: November 6, 2013 (11:00AM Eastern Time) - December 5, 2013 (5:00PM Eastern Time)
Judging Period: December 10, 2013 (11:00AM Eastern Time) - December 17, 2013 (5:00pm Eastern Time)
Voting Period: December 10, 2013 (11:00AM Eastern Time) - December 17, 2013 (5:00pm Eastern Time)
Winners Announced: On or around December 18, 2013 (5:00pm Eastern Time)
Submissions will be scored by the judges on the following criteria:
(i) Creativity & Originality
(2) Simplicity
The top two submissions based on the judges scores and the top two submission based on public voting on the challenge website will be recognized on the homepage.
Please see the 
 for voting rules and other terms that apply to your participation.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Recognition on the challenge site and Fabricjs.com!
Recognition on the challenge site and Fabricjs.com!

hackathon-description-header: Help make the web beautiful by creating new demos with Fabric.js
